entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 10:12 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:12 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
